name: Tower Stairwell
short_description: The amount of clothing in this room would suggest this was a closet if not for the massive map spanning across the walls. A strange rune-filled circle in the center of the room hums when you get too close.
long_description: The amount of cloaks, pointy hats, and other various clothing items and accessories hanging around the room would suggest this is just a closet if not for the map. The majority of the walls are covered with a massive map filled with points of light. In the middle of the floor, a large glowing circle created by a complex pattern of runes hums when you get too close. This place seems oddly familiar.

spiral staircase.description: Made of stone bricks, the middle of the staircase is covered in a luxurious-feeling carpet runner that spirals up into the distance. It seems to lead to the top of the tower.

map.description: On closer inspection, you notice the points of light on the map are actually moving. You wonder what they represent.

rune circle.description: The humming gets more intense as you get closer to the circle, and the very air seems to vibrate with some strange power. You step back, feeling unsettled.
